MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 12-DEC-2020 13:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the CH66 postcode area of Ellesmere Port, affecting properties in Ledsham Court, Black Lion Lane and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations and repairs to the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.13AM on 12th December 2020.
